verbs.description: [V: hanoi] gp set to join formula one circuit in 2020 a grand prix in hanoi will be added to the formula one calendar in 2020 as part of the sport expansion in asia f1 chairman chase carey and nguyen duc chung the mayor of hanoi made the announcement on wednesday a 5 556-kilometer circuit will be constructed near the national stadium using a combination of existing infrastructure and roads to be built in a new residential area on the edge of the city center the race track in hanoi is unique in the world with half of it being on existing streets and the other half to be built chung said the length and turns of this track will bring a lot of excitement according to designers it will be the most exciting track in the world chase carey hanoi mayor nguyen duc chung nguyen duc chung hanoi asia vietnam formula one hanoi gp
